nodes.text: The Aridinia system was a star system that was located in the Inner Rim and Trailing Sectors regions of the galaxy. The system was the origin point of the Aridinian folk music, which was infamous for causing Human ears to bleed after just a few notes and was strictly regulated outside the system as a result.
The Aridinia system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square M-13.
